row.process:
:INCLUDE PCK.AUTOMIC_FTP.PRV.INCLUDE.ATTACH :SET &UC4RB_FTP_RECURSIVE_GET# = STR_UC(&UC4RB_FTP_RECURSIVE_GET#) :SET &UC4RB_FTP_TGT_OVERWRITE# = STR_UC(&UC4RB_FTP_TGT_OVERWRITE#)
:INCLUDE PCK.AUTOMIC_FTP.PRV.INCLUDE.JAVA_CMD
:SET &UC4RB_CONVERTED_STRING# = &UC4RB_FTP_SOURCE_FILES# :INCLUDE PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.CONVERT_BACKWARD_TRAILING_SLASH :SET &UC4RB_FTP_SOURCE_FILES# = &UC4RB_CONVERTED_STRING#
:SET &UC4RB_CONVERTED_STRING# = &UC4RB_FTP_TGT_FILES_DIR# :INCLUDE PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.CONVERT_BACKWARD_TRAILING_SLASH :SET &UC4RB_FTP_TGT_FILES_DIR# = &UC4RB_CONVERTED_STRING#
:SWITCH &$PLATFORM# :CASE "WINDOWS"
:SET &UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING# = &UC4RB_FTP_SOURCE_FILES# :INCLUDE PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.ESCAPE_CHARS@WINDOWS :SET &UC4RB_FTP_SOURCE_FILES# = &UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING#
:SET &UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING# = &UC4RB_FTP_TGT_FILES_DIR# :INCLUDE PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.ESCAPE_CHARS@WINDOWS :SET &UC4RB_FTP_TGT_FILES_DIR# = &UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING#
:JCL_CONCAT_CHAR "?" &UC4RB_JAVA_CMD# dirfilehandling GetFiles -prc "&UC4RB_FTP_PROTOCOL#" ? -h "&UC4RB_FTP_HOST#" -p "&UC4RB_FTP_PORT#" -u "&UC4RB_FTP_USER#" -pwd "&UC4RB_FTP_PWD#" ? -src "&UC4RB_FTP_SOURCE_FILES#" -tgt "&UC4RB_FTP_TGT_FILES_DIR#" -o "&UC4RB_FTP_TGT_OVERWRITE#" ? -r "&UC4RB_FTP_RECURSIVE_GET#" -tm "&UC4RB_FTP_TR_MODE#" -to "&UC4RB_FTP_CONNECT_TIMEOUT#" ? -ph "&UC4RB_FTP_PROXY_HOST#" -pp "&UC4RB_FTP_PROXY_PORT#" -pu "&UC4RB_FTP_PROXY_USER#" -ppwd "&UC4RB_FTP_PROXY_PWD#" :JCL_CONCAT_CHAR
:INCLUDE PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.CHECK_CMDLINE_CMD@WINDOWS
:CASE "UNIX"
:SET &UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING# = &UC4RB_FTP_SOURCE_FILES# :INCLUDE PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.ESCAPE_CHARS@UNIX :SET &UC4RB_FTP_SOURCE_FILES# = &UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING#
:SET &UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING# = &UC4RB_FTP_TGT_FILES_DIR# :INCLUDE PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.ESCAPE_CHARS@UNIX :SET &UC4RB_FTP_TGT_FILES_DIR# = &UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING#
:JCL_CONCAT_CHAR "?" &UC4RB_JAVA_CMD# dirfilehandling GetFiles -prc "&UC4RB_FTP_PROTOCOL#" ? -h "&UC4RB_FTP_HOST#" -p "&UC4RB_FTP_PORT#" -u "&UC4RB_FTP_USER#" -pwd "&UC4RB_FTP_PWD#" ? -src "&UC4RB_FTP_SOURCE_FILES#" -tgt "&UC4RB_FTP_TGT_FILES_DIR#" -o "&UC4RB_FTP_TGT_OVERWRITE#" ? -r "&UC4RB_FTP_RECURSIVE_GET#" -tm "&UC4RB_FTP_TR_MODE#" -to "&UC4RB_FTP_CONNECT_TIMEOUT#" ? -ph "&UC4RB_FTP_PROXY_HOST#" -pp "&UC4RB_FTP_PROXY_PORT#" -pu "&UC4RB_FTP_PROXY_USER#" -ppwd "&UC4RB_FTP_PROXY_PWD#" :JCL_CONCAT_CHAR
:INCLUDE PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.CHECK_SHELL_CMD@UNIX
:OTHER : STOP NOMSG, 50, "Unknown Platform" :ENDSWITCH
